english: If you eat poison, eat the plate too
meaning: If you must do it, go all the way

english: Wind in the willow
meaning: Stay flexible and let problems pass

english: A rolling stone gathers no moss

japanese: 人のふり見て我がふり直せ
romaji: Hito no furi mite waga furi naose
english: Watch others and correct yourself
Well-side conference
Hurry to do good
meaning: If it's worth doing, do it at once

english: Spilled water will not return to the tray
meaning: What is done cannot be undone

romaji: Ishi no ue ni mo sannen
english: Three years on a stone
Fall seven times, stand up eight
meaning: Perseverance through failure leads to success

english: Even monkeys fall from trees
The mouth is the source of disaster
meaning: Be careful what you say, words can cause trouble

english: One stone, two birds
meaning: Accomplishing two things with one action

japanese: 郷に入っては郷に従え
romaji: Gou ni itte wa gou ni shitagae
english: When in a village, follow the village customs
meaning: When in Rome, do as the Romans do

english: Not knowing is Buddha

japanese: 二兎を追う者は一兎をも得ず
romaji: Ni to wo ou mono wa itto wo mo ezu
english: One who chases two rabbits catches neither
meaning: Focus on one thing at a time

english: Not knowing is Buddha

japanese: 二兎を追う者は一兎をも得ず
romaji: Ni to wo ou mono wa itto wo mo ezu
english: One who chases two rabbits catches neither
meaning: Focus on one thing at a time

english: Time is money
meaning: Time is valuable and should not be wasted

english: Hearing a hundred times is not as good as seeing once
A cane before falling

japanese: 案ずるより産むが易し
english: Giving birth is easier than worrying
meaning: Things are often easier done than worried about

japanese: 三人寄れば文殊の知恵
english: Three people together have the wisdom of Monju
meaning: Two heads are better than one

english: Seven falls, eight struggles
meaning: Going through great pain and struggle

english: The nail that sticks out gets hammered down
meaning: Those who stand out may face criticism

japanese: 井の中の蛙大海を知らず
romaji: I no naka no kawazu taikai wo shirazu
english: A frog in a well does not know the great sea
meaning: Those with limited experience cannot understand the bigger picture

english: Gold coins to a cat
meaning: Giving something valuable to someone who can't appreciate it

english: Early rising is worth three coins
meaning: The early bird catches the worm

english: One time, one meeting
meaning: Treasure every encounter, for it will never recur

english: Preaching Buddha to a horse's ear
meaning: Wasting good advice on someone who won't listen

english: Ten people, ten colors
A frog's child is a frog

japanese: 犬も歩けば棒に当たる
romaji: Inu mo arukeba bou ni ataru
english: Even a walking dog will hit a stick
meaning: Try anything and you might get lucky (or unlucky)

english: Good medicine tastes bitter

japanese: 虎穴に入らずんば虎子を得ず
romaji: Koketsu ni irazunba koji wo ezu
english: If you don't enter the tiger's den, you can't get the cub
A frog's child is a frog

romaji: Warau kado ni wa fuku kitaru
english: Fortune comes to a laughing gate
meaning: Happiness and good fortune come to those who smile

english: If fish has heart, water has heart
A cane before falling
If in a hurry, go around
meaning: Taking the safer, longer route is sometimes faster

english: Continuation is power
meaning: Persistence leads to strength and success

romaji: Ishi no ue ni mo san nen
english: Three years on a stone
meaning: Patience and perseverance will eventually pay off

romaji: Koubou ni mo fude no ayamari
english: Even Kobo makes mistakes with his brush
Carelessness is the greatest enemy

japanese: 明日は明日の風が吹く
romaji: Ashita wa ashita no kaze ga fuku
english: Tomorrow's wind will blow tomorrow
meaning: Don't worry too much about the future

english: A strong person under the veranda
meaning: An unsung hero who supports behind the scenes

english: Tap a stone bridge before crossing
Dumplings over flowers
meaning: Practical needs are more important than aesthetic pleasures

japanese: 転んでもただでは起きぬ
romaji: Koronde mo tada de wa okinu
english: Even if you fall, don't get up empty-handed
Spilled water will not return to the tray
meaning: What is done cannot be undone

english: Dripping water pierces stone
A three-day monk
A rice cake falls from the shelf
Fall seven times, get up eight

japanese: 急いては事を仕損じる
english: Haste will spoil things
The neighbor's flowers are red
meaning: The grass is always greener on the other side

english: Hide your head, but not your butt

romaji: Hana wa sakuragi hito wa bushi
english: Among flowers, the cherry blossom; among men, the warrior
I'd even borrow a cat's paw
An iron club to an ogre
One cry of the crane
meaning: A single influential person settles a matter

romaji: Tabi wa michizure yo wa nasake
english: Travel needs companions; life needs kindness
Counting a raccoon dog's skins before catching it
meaning: Don't count your chickens before they hatch

english: Do laundry while the ogre is away

japanese: 虎穴に入らずんば虎子を得ず
romaji: Koketsu ni irazunba koji wo ezu
english: You can’t get the tiger’s cub without entering the lair

romaji: Hari no ana kara ten wo nozoku
english: Peek at the sky through a needle's eye
meaning: A narrow viewpoint leads to poor judgment

english: The moon and a turtle
Fame from a mistake
meaning: A lucky break that comes from an error

english: Sometimes losing is winning
meaning: Conceding can be the best outcome

english: After the rain, the ground hardens
An inch ahead is darkness

japanese: 二度あることは三度ある
romaji: Nido aru koto wa sando aru
english: What happens twice will happen a third time
It's darkest under the lighthouse

romaji: Ki wo mite mori wo mizu
english: See the trees but not the forest

japanese: 喉元過ぎれば熱さを忘れる
english: Once it passes your throat, you forget the heat
meaning: People forget hardships once they are over

english: A bee on a crying face

romaji: Nou aru taka wa tsume wo kakusu
english: A skilled hawk hides its talons
Spilled water doesn’t return to the tray
Water on a hot stone

romaji: Nasake wa hito no tame narazu
english: Kindness is not for others alone
Bamboo shoots after rain

romaji: Senri no michi mo ippo kara
english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with one step

japanese: 井の中の蛙大海を知らず
romaji: I no naka no kawazu taikai wo shirazu
english: A frog in a well doesn’t know the ocean
The mouth is the source of misfortune

japanese: 明日は明日の風が吹く
romaji: Ashita wa ashita no kaze ga fuku
english: Tomorrow’s wind will blow tomorrow
meaning: Don’t worry too much about the future

english: With comfort comes hardship
What you imagine is better than reality
meaning: Things unseen often seem more beautiful than they really are

english: Early rising is worth three coins
meaning: Good things come from getting up early

english: Stomach 80 percent full
Water on a hot stone
meaning: A futile effort with little effect

english: Just watching is a pleasure
meaning: Enjoy observing; you don't always need to participate

english: Dried bonito to a cat
meaning: Leave temptation unattended at your own risk

romaji: Ishi no ue ni mo san nen
english: Three years on a stone
meaning: Perseverance leads to success; even cold stone warms with patience

english: After ease comes hardship
meaning: Good times and bad times alternate

romaji: Senri no michi mo ippo kara
english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with one step
meaning: Start small to reach big goals

english: A bee on a crying face
Even a packhorse driver looks good in fine clothes
The day you decide is a lucky day

japanese: 二兎を追う者は一兎をも得ず
romaji: Ni to wo ou mono wa itto wo mo ezu
english: Chase two rabbits, catch none

romaji: Nen ni wa nen wo ireyo
english: Put care into care
Mochi should be made by the mochi shop

romaji: Hana wa sakuragi hito wa bushi
english: Among flowers, cherry blossoms; among men, warriors

japanese: 藪をつついて蛇を出す
romaji: Yabu wo tsutsuite hebi wo dasu
english: Poke the bush and bring out a snake

romaji: Nasake wa hito no tame narazu
english: Kindness is not for others

romaji: Warau kado ni wa fuku kitaru
english: Good fortune comes to a laughing home
The nail that sticks out gets hammered down

english: After rain, the ground hardens
Early rising brings three coins of benefit
Boat while tomorrow hasn't come
